pr_title: Do not install ingest-attachment in xpack qa tests

timeline.message:
Do not install ingest-attachment in xpack qa tests

Don't attempt to install ingest-attachment in smoke-test-plugins
and smoke-test-plugins-ssl.

See 12b24bfa57ae3b282427298cffc735ab9fe5868f, x-pack/qa tests were
missed in that change.
